Text: The legion has suffered from too many and too frequent reboots in the past. I'm hoping they can maintain a consistent storyline this time. I've always loved the main characters in this series, so I really hope it doesnt become another disappointment due to cancellation or some cosmic time changing event.

I've pretty much given up on the Legion at this point, which is sad because these stories by Abnett and Lanning are amazing.  Their cosmic work at Marvel is fantastic as well and I may post all of that at a later date
